trans-unit.source: Array of costs.
trans-unit.target: 一系列的费用。

trans-unit.source: Array of dimensions (H,W,N), where (H,W) are the dimensions of the input image and N is n_bins or image.max() + 1 if no value is provided as a parameter. Effectively, each pixel is a N-D feature vector that is the histogram. The sum of the elements in the feature vector will be 1, unless no pixels in the window were covered by both selem and mask, in which case all elements will be 0.
trans-unit.target: 尺寸（H，W，N）的数组，其中（H，W）是输入图像的尺寸，如果未提供任何值作为参数，则N是n_bins或 image.max() + 1 。实际上，每个像素都是ND特征向量，即直方图。除非窗口中的像素没有被selem和mask覆盖，否则特征向量中元素的总和将为1，在这种情况下，所有元素将为0。

trans-unit.source: Array of pixels to be inpainted. Have to be the same shape as one of the ‘image’ channels. Unknown pixels have to be represented with 1, known pixels - with 0.
trans-unit.target: 要修复的像素数组。必须与“图像”通道之一的形状相同。未知像素必须用1表示，已知像素-用0表示。

trans-unit.source: Array of positive floats, same shape as image, defining the local variance at every image point. Used in ‘localvar’.
trans-unit.target: 正浮点数组，与 image 形状相同，定义每个图像点的局部方差。在'localvar'中使用。

trans-unit.source: Array of same shape as image. Only points at which mask == True are used for the equalization, which is applied to the whole image.
trans-unit.target: 与 image 形状相同的数组。仅将mask == True的点用于均衡，该均衡将应用于整个图像。

trans-unit.source: Array of same shape as image. Only points at which mask == True will be labeled.
trans-unit.target: 与 image 形状相同的数组。仅掩码== True的点将被标记。

trans-unit.source: Array of same shape as image. The value of each pixel is the index of its parent in the ravelled array.
trans-unit.target: 与图像形状相同的数组。每个像素的值是其父代的索引,在ravelled数组中。

trans-unit.source: Array of seed markers labeled with different positive integers for different phases. Zero-labeled pixels are unlabeled pixels. Negative labels correspond to inactive pixels that are not taken into account (they are removed from the graph). If labels are not consecutive integers, the labels array will be transformed so that labels are consecutive. In the multichannel case, labels should have the same shape as a single channel of data, i.e. without the final dimension denoting channels.
trans-unit.target: 种子标记的数组，用于标记不同相位的不同正整数。零标记像素是未标记像素。负标签对应于未考虑的无效像素（它们已从图形中删除）。如果标签不是连续的整数，则将转换标签数组，以便标签是连续的。在多通道情况下， labels 应具有与单个 data 通道相同的形状，即没有最终维表示通道。

trans-unit.source: Array which the function will be applied to.
trans-unit.target: 函数将被应用到的数组。

trans-unit.source: Array with input image data.
trans-unit.target: 输入图像数据的阵列。

trans-unit.target: 如上所述,对于对称物体,当以物体的中心点或质量中心为中心时(默认),奇数阶矩(列1和3,行1和3)为零。如果我们通过添加一个新点来打破对称性,这一点就不再成立。

trans-unit.source: BRIEF (Binary Robust Independent Elementary Features) is an efficient feature point descriptor. It is highly discriminative even when using relatively few bits and is computed using simple intensity difference tests.
trans-unit.target: BRIEF(Binary Robust Independent Elementary Features)是一种高效的特征点描述器。即使在使用相对较少的位数时,它也具有很高的判别能力,并且使用简单的强度差测试来计算。

trans-unit.source: BRIEF binary descriptor
trans-unit.target: 简短的二进制描述符

trans-unit.source: BRIEF binary descriptor extractor.
trans-unit.target: BRIEF二进制描述符提取器。

trans-unit.source: Background color. Must be a name in color_dict or RGB float values between [0, 1].
trans-unit.target: 背景颜色。必须是 color_dict 或[0，1]之间的RGB浮点值的名称。

trans-unit.source: Backward compatible keyword, superseded by as_gray.
trans-unit.target: 向后兼容的关键字，由 as_gray 取代。

trans-unit.source: Balances color proximity and space proximity. Higher values give more weight to space proximity, making superpixel shapes more square/cubic. In SLICO mode, this is the initial compactness. This parameter depends strongly on image contrast and on the shapes of objects in the image. We recommend exploring possible values on a log scale, e.g., 0.01, 0.1, 1, 10, 100, before refining around a chosen value.
trans-unit.target: 平衡颜色接近度和空间接近度。数值越高,空间接近度的权重越大,使超级像素形状更加方/立方。在SLICO模式下,这是初始紧凑度。这个参数很大程度上取决于图像对比度和图像中物体的形状。我们建议在围绕选定的值进行细化之前,先在对数范围内探索可能的值,例如,0.01、0.1、1、10、100。

trans-unit.source: Balances color-space proximity and image-space proximity. Higher values give more weight to color-space.
trans-unit.target: 平衡色彩空间的接近性和图像空间的接近性。值越高,色彩空间的权重越大。

trans-unit.source: Balloon force to guide the contour in non-informative areas of the image, i.e., areas where the gradient of the image is too small to push the contour towards a border. A negative value will shrink the contour, while a positive value will expand the contour in these areas. Setting this to zero will disable the balloon force.
trans-unit.target: 在图像的非信息区域(即图像的梯度太小,无法将轮廓推向边界的区域)引导轮廓的气球力。负值将缩小轮廓,而正值将扩大这些区域的轮廓。将其设置为零将禁用气球力。

trans-unit.source: Be careful! In NumPy indexing, the first dimension (camera.shape[0]) corresponds to rows, while the second (camera.shape[1]) corresponds to columns, with the origin (camera[0, 0]) at the top-left corner. This matches matrix/linear algebra notation, but is in contrast to Cartesian (x, y) coordinates. See Coordinate conventions below for more details.
trans-unit.target: 当心！在NumPy索引中，第一个维度（ camera.shape[0] ）对应于行，而第二个 camera.shape[1] （camera.shape [1]）对应于列，原点（ camera[0, 0] ）位于左上角角落。这与矩阵/线性代数符号匹配，但是与笛卡尔（x，y）坐标相反。有关更多详细信息，请参见下面的坐标约定。

trans-unit.source: Be careful! These conversions can result in a loss of precision, since 8 bits cannot hold the same amount of information as 64 bits:
trans-unit.target: 小心!这些转换会导致精度损失。这些转换可能会导致精度损失,因为8位不能容纳与64位相同数量的信息。

trans-unit.source: Be careful: in NumPy indexing, the first dimension (camera.shape[0]) corresponds to rows, while the second (camera.shape[1]) corresponds to columns, with the origin (camera[0, 0]) on the top-left corner. This matches matrix/linear algebra notation, but is in contrast to Cartesian (x, y) coordinates. See Coordinate conventions below for more details.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在NumPy索引中，第一个维度（ camera.shape[0] ）对应于行，而第二个 camera.shape[1] （camera.shape [1]）对应于列，且原点（ camera[0, 0] ）左上角。这与矩阵/线性代数符号匹配，但是与笛卡尔（x，y）坐标相反。有关更多详细信息，请参见下面的坐标约定。

trans-unit.source: Because scikit-image represents images using NumPy arrays, the coordinate conventions must match. Two-dimensional (2D) grayscale images (such as camera above) are indexed by rows and columns (abbreviated to either (row, col) or (r, c)), with the lowest element (0, 0) at the top-left corner. In various parts of the library, you will also see rr and cc refer to lists of row and column coordinates. We distinguish this convention from (x, y), which commonly denote standard Cartesian coordinates, where x is the horizontal coordinate, y - the vertical one, and the origin is at the bottom left (Matplotlib axes, for example, use this convention).
trans-unit.target: 由于 scikit-image 使用NumPy数组表示图像，因此坐标约定必须匹配。二维（2D）灰度图像（例如上面的 camera ）由行和列（缩写为 (row, col) 或 (r, c) ）索引，而最低的元素 (0, 0) 在顶部，左上角。在库的各个部分，您还将看到 rr 和 cc 指的是行和列坐标的列表。我们将此约定与 (x, y) 区别开来，后者通常表示标准笛卡尔坐标，其中 x 是水平坐标 y -垂直轴，并且原点在左下角（例如，Matplotlib轴使用此约定）。

trans-unit.source: Because marching cubes could be used to find isosurfaces either on gradient descent (where the desired object has greater values than the exterior) or ascent (where the desired object has lower values than the exterior), the gradient_direction kwarg allows the user to inform this algorithm which is correct. If the resulting mesh appears to be oriented completely incorrectly, try changing this option.
trans-unit.target: 因为行进立方体可用于在梯度下降（所需对象的值大于外部值）或上升（其中所需对象的值小于外部值）时查找等值面，所以 gradient_direction kwarg允许用户通知此算法哪个是正确的。如果生成的网格看起来完全不正确地定向，请尝试更改此选项。

trans-unit.source: Because of a banding pattern artifact in the background, this image is a good test of thresholding algorithms. The pixel spacing is 0.107 µm.
trans-unit.target: 由于背景中出现带状图案伪影，因此该图像是阈值算法的良好测试。像素间距为0.107 µm。

trans-unit.source: Because of interactions between neighboring cubes, the isosurface(s) generated by this algorithm are NOT guaranteed to be closed, particularly for complicated contours. Furthermore, this algorithm does not guarantee a single contour will be returned. Indeed, ALL isosurfaces which cross level will be found, regardless of connectivity.
trans-unit.target: 由于相邻立方体之间的相互作用，因此不能保证通过此算法生成的等值面是闭合的，尤其是对于复杂的轮廓。此外，此算法不能保证将返回单个轮廓。实际上，无论连通性如何，都会找到所有跨 level 等值面。

trans-unit.source: Because of the prevalence of exclusively positive floating-point images in intermediate calculations, it is not possible to intuit if an input is signed based on dtype alone. Instead, negative values are explicitly searched for. Only if found does this function assume signed input. Unexpected results only occur in rare, poorly exposes cases (e.g. if all values are above 50 percent gray in a signed image). In this event, manually scaling the input to the positive domain will solve the problem.
trans-unit.target: 由于在中间计算中普遍存在正浮点图像，因此无法判断输入是否仅基于dtype进行签名。而是显式搜索负值。仅在找到此功能后，该功能才会采用带符号的输入。出乎意料的结果仅在极少数情况下曝光不佳的情况下发生（例如，如果所有值均在签名 image 灰度高于50％）。在这种情况下，手动将输入缩放到正域将解决该问题。

trans-unit.source: Because of the prevalence of exclusively positive floating-point images in intermediate calculations, it is not possible to intuit if an input is signed based on dtype alone. Instead, negative values are explicity searched for. Only if found does this function assume signed input. Unexpected results only occur in rare, poorly exposes cases (e.g. if all values are above 50 percent gray in a signed image). In this event, manually scaling the input to the positive domain will solve the problem.
trans-unit.target: 由于在中间计算中普遍存在正浮点图像，因此无法判断输入是否仅基于dtype进行签名。而是显式搜索负值。仅在找到此功能后，该功能才会采用带符号的输入。出乎意料的结果仅在罕见，曝光不佳的情况下才会发生（例如，如果所有值均超过签名 image 50％的灰度）。在这种情况下，手动将输入缩放到正域将解决该问题。

trans-unit.source: Because we represent images with numpy arrays, our coordinates must match accordingly. Two-dimensional (2D) grayscale images (such as camera above) are indexed by row and columns (abbreviated to either (row, col) or (r, c)), with the lowest element (0, 0) at the top-left corner. In various parts of the library, you will also see rr and cc refer to lists of row and column coordinates. We distinguish this from (x, y), which commonly denote standard Cartesian coordinates, where x is the horizontal coordinate, y the vertical, and the origin is on the bottom left. (Matplotlib, for example, uses this convention.)
trans-unit.target: 因为我们用numpy数组表示图像，所以坐标必须相应地匹配。二维（2D）灰度图像（例如上面的 camera ）由行和列（缩写为 (row, col) 或 (r, c) ）索引，而最低元素 (0, 0) 在顶部，左上角。在库的各个部分，您还将看到 rr 和 cc 指的是行和列坐标的列表。我们将此与 (x, y) 区别开来，后者通常表示标准笛卡尔坐标，其中 x 是水平坐标 y 垂直，并且原点在左下方。（例如，Matplotlib使用此约定。）

trans-unit.source: Blobs are found using the Determinant of Hessian method [1]. For each blob found, the method returns its coordinates and the standard deviation of the Gaussian Kernel used for the Hessian matrix whose determinant detected the blob. Determinant of Hessians is approximated using [2].
trans-unit.target: 使用Hessian行列式方法[1]找到斑点。对于找到的每个斑点，该方法将返回其坐标和用于决定因素检测到斑点的Hessian矩阵的高斯核的标准偏差。Hessians的行列式可使用[2]进行近似。

trans-unit.source: Blobs are found using the Determinant of Hessian method [1]. For each blob found, the method returns its coordinates and the standard deviation of the Gaussian Kernel used for the Hessian matrix whose determinant detected the blob. Determinant of Hessians is approximated using [2].
trans-unit.target: 斑点被使用Hessian的行列式的方法发现[1] 。对于找到的每个斑点，该方法返回其坐标和用于决定因素检测到斑点的Hessian矩阵的高斯核的标准偏差。Hessians的行列式可使用[2]进行近似。

trans-unit.source: Blobs are found using the Difference of Gaussian (DoG) method [1]. For each blob found, the method returns its coordinates and the standard deviation of the Gaussian kernel that detected the blob.
trans-unit.target: 使用高斯差（DoG）方法[1]找到斑点。对于找到的每个斑点，该方法返回其坐标和检测到斑点的高斯核的标准偏差。

trans-unit.source: Blobs are found using the Laplacian of Gaussian (LoG) method [1]. For each blob found, the method returns its coordinates and the standard deviation of the Gaussian kernel that detected the blob.

trans-unit.source: Boolean array. The marching cube algorithm will be computed only on True elements. This will save computational time when interfaces are located within certain region of the volume M, N, P-e.g. the top half of the cube-and also allow to compute finite surfaces-i.e. open surfaces that do not end at the border of the cube.
trans-unit.target: 布尔数组。行进立方体算法将只在True元素上进行计算,这样可以在界面位于体积M,N,P的某一区域内--例如立方体的上半部分--节省计算时间。当界面位于 M,N,P 的特定区域内时,这将节省计算时间--例如立方体的上半部分--同时也允许计算有限曲面--即不在立方体边界的开放曲面。

trans-unit.source: Boolean mask for moving_image. The mask should evaluate to True (or 1) on valid pixels. moving_mask should have the same shape as moving_image. If None, reference_mask will be used.
trans-unit.target: 布尔面具 moving_image 。在有效像素上，遮罩应评估为 True （或1）。 moving_mask 应该具有与 moving_image 相同的形状。如果为 None ，则将使用 reference_mask 。

trans-unit.source: Boolean mask for reference_image. The mask should evaluate to True (or 1) on valid pixels. reference_mask should have the same shape as reference_image.

trans-unit.source: Boundary conditions for the contour. Can be one of ‘periodic’, ‘free’, ‘fixed’, ‘free-fixed’, or ‘fixed-free’. ‘periodic’ attaches the two ends of the snake, ‘fixed’ holds the end-points in place, and ‘free’ allows free movement of the ends. ‘fixed’ and ‘free’ can be combined by parsing ‘fixed-free’, ‘free-fixed’. Parsing ‘fixed-fixed’ or ‘free-free’ yields same behaviour as ‘fixed’ and ‘free’, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 轮廓的边界条件。可以是“定期”，“免费”，“固定”，“自由固定”或“无固定”之一。“定期”将蛇的两个末端连接在一起，“固定”将端点固定在适当的位置，“自由”允许末端自由移动。可以通过解析“无固定”，“固定”来组合“固定”和“免费”。解析“固定-固定”或“免费-自由”分别产生与“固定”和“免费”相同的行为。

trans-unit.source: Boundary conditions for worm. ‘periodic’ attaches the two ends of the snake, ‘fixed’ holds the end-points in place, and’free’ allows free movement of the ends. ‘fixed’ and ‘free’ can be combined by parsing ‘fixed-free’, ‘free-fixed’. Parsing ‘fixed-fixed’ or ‘free-free’ yields same behaviour as ‘fixed’ and ‘free’, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 蠕虫的边界条件。“定期”将蛇的两个末端连接在一起，“固定”将端点固定在适当的位置，“自由”允许末端自由移动。可以通过解析“无固定”，“固定”来组合“固定”和“免费”。解析“固定-固定”或“免费-自由”分别产生与“固定”和“免费”相同的行为。

trans-unit.source: Certain applications and mesh processing algorithms require all faces to be oriented in a consistent way. Generally, this means a normal vector points “out” of the meshed shapes. This algorithm corrects the output from skimage.measure.marching_cubes_classic by flipping the orientation of mis-oriented faces.

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.14.1: Previously, label_image was processed by numpy.squeeze and so any number of singleton dimensions was allowed. This resulted in inconsistent handling of images with singleton dimensions. To recover the old behaviour, use regionprops(np.squeeze(label_image), ...).
trans-unit.target: 在0.14.1版改变：以前， label_image 被处理 numpy.squeeze 等被允许任何数量的单尺寸。这导致对单例尺寸的图像的处理不一致。要恢复旧的行为，请使用 regionprops(np.squeeze(label_image), ...) 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.16: Default behavior has been changed from ‘rank’ to ‘ndimage’
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.16中更改：默认 behavior 已从“等级”更改为“ ndimage”

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.16: For floating point inputs, the original input range is maintained and there is no clipping applied to the output. Other input types will be converted to a floating point value in the range [-1, 1] or [0, 1] depending on the input image range. Unless rescale_sigma = False, any internal rescaling applied to the image will also be applied to sigma to maintain the same relative amplitude.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.16中进行了更改：对于浮点输入，将保持原始输入范围，并且不对输出施加任何削波。根据输入图像范围，其他输入类型将转换为[-1，1]或[0，1]范围内的浮点值。除非 rescale_sigma = False ，否则应用于 image 任何内部重新缩放也将应用于 sigma 以维持相同的相对幅度。

trans-unit.source: Color images can be represented using different color spaces. One of the most common color spaces is the RGB space, where an image has red, green and blue channels. trans-unit.source: Color images can be represented using different color spaces. One of the most common color spaces is the RGB space, where an image has red, green and blue channels. trans-unit.source: Compared to the classic algorithm, all pixels of a patch contribute to the distance to another patch with the same weight, no matter their distance to the center of the patch. This coarser computation of the distance can result in a slightly poorer denoising performance. Moreover, for small images (images with a linear size that is only a few times the patch size), the classic algorithm can be faster due to boundary effects.
trans-unit.target: 与经典算法相比,一个补丁的所有像素都以相同的权重贡献到与另一个补丁的距离上,无论它们与补丁中心的距离如何。这种较粗的距离计算会导致去噪性能稍差。此外,对于小图像(图像的线性尺寸只有补丁尺寸的几倍),由于边界效应,经典算法可以更快。

trans-unit.target: 分割和超级像素算法的比较。

trans-unit.target: 复杂的过滤器内核。

trans-unit.source: Component trees represent the hierarchical structure of the connected components resulting from sequential thresholding operations applied to an image. A connected component at one level is parent of a component at a higher level if the latter is included in the first. A max-tree is an efficient representation of a component tree. A connected component at one level is represented by one reference pixel at this level, which is parent to all other pixels at that level and to the reference pixel at the level above. The max-tree is the basis for many morphological operators, namely connected operators.
trans-unit.target: 分量树表示应用于图像的连续阈值操作所产生的连接组件的层次结构。如果上一级组件中包含了一个连接的组件,那么它就是上一级组件的父级。最大树是分量树的有效表示方法。在一个层次上的连接分量由这个层次上的一个参考像素来表示,这个参考像素是该层次上所有其他像素和上一层次上的参考像素的父级。最大树是许多形态学运算符,即连接运算符的基础。

trans-unit.source: Contours are oriented. By default, array values lower than the contour value are to the left of the contour and values greater than the contour value are to the right. This means that contours will wind counter-clockwise (i.e. in ‘positive orientation’) around islands of low-valued pixels. This behavior can be altered with the ‘positive_orientation’ parameter.
trans-unit.target: 轮廓是定向的。默认情况下，小于轮廓值的数组值位于轮廓的左侧，大于轮廓值的值位于右侧。这意味着轮廓将围绕低值像素的岛逆时针（即“正方向”）缠绕。可以使用“ positive_orientation”参数更改此行为。

trans-unit.source: Cost of the path. If geometric is False, the cost of the path is the sum of the values of array along the path. If geometric is True, a finer computation is made (see the documentation of the MCP_Geometric class).
trans-unit.target: 路径成本。如果 geometric 为False，则路径的开销为沿该路径的 array 值的总和。如果 geometric 是真，更精细的计算时（见MCP_Geometric类的文档）。

trans-unit.target: 目前的油漆颜色。

trans-unit.source: Cut-off distance (in gray levels). The higher h, the more permissive one is in accepting patches. A higher h results in a smoother image, at the expense of blurring features. For a Gaussian noise of standard deviation sigma, a rule of thumb is to choose the value of h to be sigma of slightly less.
trans-unit.target: 截止距离(灰色级别)。h越高,接受斑点的权限越大。h越高,图像越平滑,但代价是模糊特征。对于标准差为sigma的高斯噪声,一个经验法则是选择h的值为sigma略小。

trans-unit.source: Cut-off point for data distances. Higher means fewer clusters.
trans-unit.target: 数据距离的截止点。越高表示聚类越少。

trans-unit.source: Cutoff of the sigmoid function that shifts the characteristic curve in horizontal direction. Default value is 0.5.
trans-unit.target: sigmoid函数在水平方向上移动特性曲线的截止值。默认值是0.5。

trans-unit.source: Cycle spinning (repeatedly apply func to shifted versions of x).
trans-unit.target: 循环旋转(重复应用func到x的移位版本)。

trans-unit.source: Cycle spinning was proposed as a way to approach shift-invariance via performing several circular shifts of a shift-variant transform [1].
trans-unit.target: 提出了循环旋转作为通过执行移位变量变换的几个循环移位来实现移位不变性的方法[1]。

trans-unit.source: DAISY is a feature descriptor similar to SIFT formulated in a way that allows for fast dense extraction. Typically, this is practical for bag-of-features image representations.
trans-unit.target: DAISY是一种类似于SIFT的特征描述符,它以一种允许快速密集提取的方式制定。通常情况下,这对特征袋图像表示是实用的。

trans-unit.source: Data array where the lowest value points are labeled first.
trans-unit.target: 数据数组,其中最低值点先标注。

trans-unit.source: Data for input to func.
trans-unit.target: 输入到 func 的数据。

trans-unit.source: Data set to which the model is fitted, where N is the number of data points and D the dimensionality of the data. If the model class requires multiple input data arrays (e.g. source and destination coordinates of skimage.transform.AffineTransform), they can be optionally passed as tuple or list. Note, that in this case the functions estimate(*data), residuals(*data), is_model_valid(model, *random_data) and is_data_valid(*random_data) must all take each data array as separate arguments.
trans-unit.target: 模型适合的数据集，其中N是数据点的数量，D是数据的维数。如果模型类需要多个输入数据数组（例如 skimage.transform.AffineTransform 的源坐标和目标坐标），则可以选择将它们作为元组或列表传递。请注意，在这种情况下，函数 estimate(*data) ， residuals(*data) ， is_model_valid(model, *random_data) 和 is_data_valid(*random_data) 必须全部将每个数据数组作为单独的参数。

trans-unit.source: Data set to which the model is fitted, where N is the number of data points and the remaining dimension are depending on model requirements. If the model class requires multiple input data arrays (e.g. source and destination coordinates of skimage.transform.AffineTransform), they can be optionally passed as tuple or list. Note, that in this case the functions estimate(*data), residuals(*data), is_model_valid(model, *random_data) and is_data_valid(*random_data) must all take each data array as separate arguments.
trans-unit.target: 模型所适合的数据集，其中N是数据点的数量，其余维取决于模型要求。如果模型类需要多个输入数据数组（例如 skimage.transform.AffineTransform 的源坐标和目标坐标），则可以选择将它们作为元组或列表传递。请注意，在这种情况下，函数 estimate(*data) ， residuals(*data) ， is_model_valid(model, *random_data) 和 is_data_valid(*random_data) 必须全部将每个数据数组作为单独的参数。

trans-unit.source: Data structures to hold collections of images, with optional caching.
trans-unit.target: 数据结构用于保存图像集合,并可选择缓存。

trans-unit.source: Data to initialize graph. If None (default) an empty graph is created. The data can be an edge list, or any NetworkX graph object. If the corresponding optional Python packages are installed the data can also be a NumPy matrix or 2d ndarray, a SciPy sparse matrix, or a PyGraphviz graph.
trans-unit.target: 初始化图形的数据。如果没有(默认),则创建一个空的图形。数据可以是一个边缘列表,或者任何NetworkX图对象。如果安装了相应的可选Python包,数据也可以是NumPy矩阵或2d ndarray,SciPy稀疏矩阵或PyGraphviz图形。

trans-unit.source: Data type
trans-unit.target: 数据类型

trans-unit.source: Data type of items in ‘value’ in Python struct format. One of B, s, H, I, 2I, b, h, i, 2i, f, d, Q, or q.
trans-unit.target: Python结构格式中“值”项的数据类型。B，s，H，I，2I，b，h，i，2i，f，d，Q或q中的一个。

trans-unit.source: Data visualization
trans-unit.target: 数据可视化

trans-unit.source: Data visualization takes an important place in image processing. Data can be a simple unique 2D image or a more complex with multidimensional aspects: 3D in space, timeslapse, multiple channels.
trans-unit.target: 数据可视化在图像处理中占有重要地位。数据可以是简单的唯一的二维图像,也可以是更复杂的多维方面。空间的3D,延时,多通道。

trans-unit.source: Date and time of image creation. Saved with the first page only. If None (default), the current date and time is used.
trans-unit.target: 图像创建的日期和时间。仅与第一页一起保存。如果 "无"(默认),则使用当前日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: Default is 0 if image.dtype is bool and 1 otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果image.dtype为bool,默认为0,否则为1。

trans-unit.source: Default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认为0。

trans-unit.source: Default is None, to use the entire axis.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 None ，以使用整个轴。

trans-unit.source: Default slider value. If None, use midpoint between low and high.
trans-unit.target: 默认滑块值。如果为None，请在 low 和 high 之间使用中点。

trans-unit.source: Define the [p0, p1] percentile interval to be considered for computing the value.
trans-unit.target: 定义计算数值时要考虑的[p0,p1]百分位区间。

trans-unit.source: Define the [s0, s1] interval around the greyvalue of the center pixel to be considered for computing the value.
trans-unit.target: 定义中心像素的灰度值周围的[s0,s1]区间,以考虑计算该值。

trans-unit.source: Define the size of the discrete Laplacian operator such that it will have a size of (ksize,) * image.ndim.
trans-unit.target: 定义离散拉普拉斯运算符的大小,使其大小为(ksize,)*image.ndim。

trans-unit.source: Define triangular faces via referencing vertex indices from verts. This algorithm specifically outputs triangles, so each face has exactly three indices.
trans-unit.target: 通过引用来自 verts 顶点索引来定义三角形面。该算法专门输出三角形，因此每个面正好具有三个索引。

trans-unit.source: Defined only for 2-D and 3-D images. Almost equal to Frangi filter, but uses alternative method of smoothing. Refer to [1] to find the differences between Frangi and Hessian filters.
trans-unit.target: 仅针对2D和3D图像定义。几乎等于Frangi过滤器，但使用其他平滑方法。参考[1]，找出Frangi和Hessian过滤器之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: Defined only for 2-D and 3-D images. Calculates the eigenvectors of the Hessian to compute the similarity of an image region to tubes, according to the method described in [1].
trans-unit.target: 仅针对2D和3D图像定义。根据[1]中所述的方法，计算Hessian的特征向量，以计算图像区域与电子管的相似度。

trans-unit.source: Defined only for 2-D and 3-D images. Calculates the eigenvectors of the Hessian to compute the similarity of an image region to vessels, according to the method described in [1].
trans-unit.target: 仅针对2D和3D图像定义。根据[1]中所述的方法，计算Hessian的特征向量，以计算图像区域与血管的相似度。

trans-unit.source: Defines how the algorithm interprets input data. “real” means data will be FFT’d to compute the correlation, while “fourier” data will bypass FFT of input data. Case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 定义算法如何解释输入数据。“实数”表示将对数据进行FFT以计算相关性，而“傅立叶”数据将绕过输入数据的FFT。不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Defines how the algorithm interprets input data. “real” means data will be FFT’d to compute the correlation, while “fourier” data will bypass FFT of input data. Case insensitive. Not used if any of reference_mask or moving_mask is not None.
trans-unit.target: 定义算法如何解释输入数据。“实数”表示将对数据进行FFT以计算相关性，而“傅立叶”数据将绕过输入数据的FFT。不区分大小写。如果 reference_mask 或 moving_mask 中的任何一个都不为None，则不使用。

trans-unit.source: Defines the shape of contextual regions used in the algorithm. If iterable is passed, it must have the same number of elements as image.ndim (without color channel). If integer, it is broadcasted to each image dimension. By default, kernel_size is 1/8 of image height by 1/8 of its width.
trans-unit.target: 定义算法中使用的上下文区域的形状。如果传递了iterable，则它必须具有与 image.ndim 相同的元素数（无颜色通道）。如果为整数，则将其广播到每个 image 尺寸。默认情况下， kernel_size 是 image 高度的1/8乘其宽度的1/8。

trans-unit.source: Defines the shape of the elementary n-dimensional orthotope (better know as hyperrectangle [1]) of the rolling window view. If an integer is given, the shape will be a hypercube of sidelength given by its value.
trans-unit.target: 定义滚动窗口视图的基本n维正交原点的形状（最好称为hyperrectangle [1]）。如果给出整数，则形状将是其值给出的边长的超立方体。

trans-unit.source: Defines the starting level set used by the algorithm. If a string is inputted, a level set that matches the image size will automatically be generated. Alternatively, it is possible to define a custom level set, which should be an array of float values, with the same shape as ‘image’. Accepted string values are as follows.
trans-unit.target: 定义算法使用的起始级别集。如果输入字符串，则将自动生成与图像大小匹配的级别集。或者，可以定义一个自定义级别集，该级别集应该是一个浮点值数组，并且形状与“图像”相同。可接受的字符串值如下。

trans-unit.source: Defines which pages to return as array.
trans-unit.target: 定义要返回的页面数组。

trans-unit.source: Defines which series of pages to return as array.
trans-unit.target: 定义以数组形式返回的页面系列。

trans-unit.source: Definitions of common terms.
trans-unit.target: 常用术语的定义;

trans-unit.source: Degree of B-Spline. Default is 2.
trans-unit.target: B-Spline的程度。默认为2。

trans-unit.source: Denoise image using bilateral filter.
trans-unit.target: 使用双边滤波器对图像进行去噪处理。

trans-unit.source: Denoised image, of same shape as image.
trans-unit.target: 经去噪的图像，具有与 image 相同的形状。

trans-unit.source: Denoised image.
trans-unit.target: 去噪图像。

trans-unit.source: Denoising a picture
trans-unit.target: 对图片进行去噪处理

trans-unit.source: Denoising function to be calibrated.
trans-unit.target: 去噪功能有待校准。

trans-unit.source: Denoising weight. The greater weight, the more denoising (at the expense of fidelity to input).
trans-unit.target: 减轻噪音。 weight 越大，去噪越多（以 input 的保真度为代价）。

trans-unit.source: Denoising weight. The smaller the weight, the more denoising (at the expense of less similarity to the input). The regularization parameter lambda is chosen as 2 * weight.
trans-unit.target: 减轻噪音。 weight 越小，则去噪越多（以与 input 相似度较小为代价）。将正则化参数 lambda 选择为 2 * weight 。

trans-unit.target: 密集的DAISY功能描述

trans-unit.source: Deprecated keyword argument. Use as_gray instead. If None, as_gray is used. Convert to grayscale.
trans-unit.target: 不推荐使用的关键字参数。请改用 as_gray 。如果为None，则使用 as_gray 。转换为灰度。

trans-unit.source: Deprecated since version 0.16.0: Use “rc” coordinates everywhere. It may be sufficient to call numpy.transpose on your label image to get the same values as 0.15 and earlier. However, for some properties, the transformation will be less trivial. For example, the new orientation is \(\frac{\pi}{2}\) plus the old orientation.
trans-unit.target: 从0.16.0版开始不推荐使用：在所有位置使用“ rc”坐标。在标签图像上调用 numpy.transpose 以获得与0.15或更早版本相同的值可能就足够了。但是，对于某些属性，转换将变得不那么琐碎。例如，新方向为\（\ frac {\ pi} {2} \）加旧方向。

trans-unit.source: Details on the cross-correlation are presented in [1]. This implementation uses FFT convolutions of the image and the template. Reference [2] presents similar derivations but the approximation presented in this reference is not used in our implementation.
trans-unit.target: 互相关的细节在[1]中给出。此实现使用图像和模板的FFT卷积。参考文献[2]给出了类似的推导，但是在我们的实现中未使用该参考文献中给出的近似值。

trans-unit.source: Determines the neighbors of each pixel. Adjacent elements within a squared distance of connectivity from pixel center are considered neighbors. If None, set to 2:
trans-unit.target: 确定每个像素的邻居。在距像素中心的 connectivity 距离的平方距离内的相邻元素被视为相邻元素。如果为 None ，则设置为2：

trans-unit.source: Diameter closing removes all dark structures of an image with maximal extension smaller than diameter_threshold. The maximal extension is defined as the maximal extension of the bounding box. The operator is also called Bounding Box Closing. In practice, the result is similar to a morphological closing, but long and thin structures are not removed.
trans-unit.target: Diameter closing(直径闭合)删除图像中最大延伸量小于 diameter_threshold 的所有暗部结构,最大延伸量定义为边界框的最大延伸量。最大扩展定义为边界盒的最大扩展。该运算符也被称为Bounding Box Closing。在实际操作中,其结果类似于形态学上的闭合,但长而薄的结构不会被去除。

trans-unit.source: Diameter opening removes all bright structures of an image with maximal extension smaller than diameter_threshold. The maximal extension is defined as the maximal extension of the bounding box. The operator is also called Bounding Box Opening. In practice, the result is similar to a morphological opening, but long and thin structures are not removed.
trans-unit.target: Diameter opening(直径开口)删除图像中最大延伸小于 diameter_threshold 的所有明亮结构。最大扩展定义为边界盒的最大扩展。该运算符也被称为Bounding Box Opening。在实际操作中,其结果类似于形态学上的打开,但长而薄的结构不会被移除。

trans-unit.source: Dict have form {‘r’: int, ‘c’: int, ‘width’: int, ‘height’: int}, where ‘r’ represents row position of top left corner of detected window, ‘c’ - col position, ‘width’ - width of detected window, ‘height’ - height of detected window.
trans-unit.target: 字典的格式为{'r'：int，'c'：int，'width'：int，'height'：int}，其中'r'代表检测到的窗口左上角的行位置，'c'-col位置，“宽度”-检测到的窗口的宽度，“高度”-检测到的窗口的高度。

trans-unit.source: Dictionary mapping property names to an array of values of that property, one value per region. This dictionary can be used as input to pandas DataFrame to map property names to columns in the frame and regions to rows. If the image has no regions, the arrays will have length 0, but the correct type.
trans-unit.target: 将属性名称映射到该属性的值的数组的字典，每个区域一个值。该字典可用作pandas DataFrame 的输入，以将属性名称映射到框架中的列，将区域映射到行。如果图像没有区域，则数组的长度为0，但类型正确。

trans-unit.source: Dictionary of ‘red’, ‘green’, ‘blue’, and (optionally) ‘alpha’ values. Each color key contains a list of x, y tuples. x must increase monotonically from 0 to 1 and corresponds to input values for a mappable object (e.g. an image). y corresponds to the color intensity.
trans-unit.target: “红色”，“绿色”，“蓝色”和（可选）“ alpha”值的字典。每个颜色键包含 x ， y 元组的列表。 x 必须从0到1单调增加，并且对应于可映射对象（例如，图像）的输入值。 y 对应于颜色强度。

trans-unit.source: Eccentricity of the ellipse that has the same second-moments as the region. The eccentricity is the ratio of the focal distance (distance between focal points) over the major axis length. The value is in the interval [0, 1). When it is 0, the ellipse becomes a circle.
trans-unit.target: 椭圆的偏心率,与区域具有相同的第二时刻。偏心率是焦点距离(焦点之间的距离)与主轴长度的比值。该值在区间[0,1)。)当它为0时,椭圆就变成了一个圆。

trans-unit.source: Even if an image uses the whole value range, sometimes there is very little weight at the ends of the value range. In such a case, clipping pixel values using percentiles of the image improves the contrast (at the expense of some loss of information, because some pixels are saturated by this operation):
trans-unit.target: 即使图像使用了整个数值范围,有时数值范围两端的权重也非常小。在这种情况下,使用图像的百分位数来剪裁像素值可以提高对比度(代价是损失一些信息,因为有些像素在这种操作下会饱和)。

trans-unit.source: Every pixel along the perimeter has a chessboard distance no greater than radius (radius=floor(width/2)) pixels.

trans-unit.source: Finally, another solution is the VideoReader class in OpenCV, which has bindings to FFmpeg. If you need OpenCV for other reasons, then this may be the best approach. However, OpenCV can be difficult to install, especially because it must be linked to FFmpeg to support reading video from files. Also, it is known to get the meta data wrong for some video codecs. (See this issue.)
trans-unit.target: 最后，另一个解决方案是OpenCV中的VideoReader类，该类具有对FFmpeg的绑定。如果出于其他原因需要OpenCV，则这可能是最好的方法。但是，OpenCV可能难以安装，特别是因为必须将其链接到FFmpeg以支持从文件读取视频。另外，已知某些视频编解码器的元数据有误。（请参阅此问题。）

trans-unit.source: Finally, another solution is the VideoReader class in OpenCV, which has bindings to FFmpeg. If you need OpenCV for other reasons, then this may be the best approach.
trans-unit.target: 最后，另一个解决方案是OpenCV中的VideoReader类，该类具有对FFmpeg的绑定。如果出于其他原因需要OpenCV，则这可能是最好的方法。

trans-unit.source: Finally, for 3D images, such as videos, magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) scans, or confocal microscopy, we refer to the leading dimension as plane, abbreviated as pln or p.
trans-unit.target: 最后，对于3D图像，例如视频，磁共振成像（MRI）扫描或共聚焦显微镜，我们将引导尺寸称为 plane ，缩写为 pln 或 p 。

trans-unit.source: Finally, for volumetric (3D) images, such as videos, magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) scans, confocal microscopy, etc. we refer to the leading dimension as plane, abbreviated as pln or p.
trans-unit.target: 最后，对于三维（3D）图像，例如视频，磁共振成像（MRI）扫描，共聚焦显微镜等，我们将前导尺寸称为 plane ，缩写为 pln 或 p 。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the use of Fourier space implies a circulant property of \(H\), see [Hunt].
trans-unit.target: 最后,Fourier空间的使用意味着一个循环属性/(H/),见[Hunt]。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we run the watershed on the image and markers:
trans-unit.target: 最后,我们在图像和标记上运行分水岭。

trans-unit.source: Fit a model to data with the RANSAC (random sample consensus) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 用RANSAC(随机样本共识)算法对数据进行模型拟合。

trans-unit.source: Fit spline to image:
trans-unit.target: 将花键与图像匹配。

trans-unit.source: Floats specifying the color for the block that has greater intensity value. They should be in the range [0, 1]. Corresponding values define (R, G, B) values. Default value is cyan (0, 0.69, 0.96).
trans-unit.target: 浮子,指定具有较大强度值的块的颜色。它们应该在[0,1]的范围内。对应的值定义(R,G,B)值。默认值是青色(0,0.69,0.96)。

trans-unit.source: Floats specifying the color for the block that has greater intensity value. They should be in the range [0, 1]. Corresponding values define (R, G, B) values. Default value is white (1, 1, 1).
trans-unit.target: 浮子,指定具有较大强度值的块的颜色。它们应该在[0,1]的范围内。对应的值定义(R,G,B)值。默认值为白色(1,1,1)。

trans-unit.source: Floats specifying the color for the negative block Corresponding values define (R, G, B) values. Default value is blue (0, 1, 0).
trans-unit.target: 指定负块颜色的浮子 对应的值定义(R,G,B)值。默认值为蓝色(0,1,0)。

trans-unit.source: Floats specifying the color for the positive block. Corresponding values define (R, G, B) values. Default value is red (1, 0, 0).
trans-unit.target: 指定正块颜色的浮子。对应的值定义(R,G,B)值。默认值为红色(1,0,0)。

trans-unit.source: Flood Fill
trans-unit.target: 灌注

trans-unit.source: For 2-D images, a function that transforms a (M, 2) array of (col, row) coordinates in the output image to their corresponding coordinates in the input image. Extra parameters to the function can be specified through map_args.
trans-unit.target: 对于2-D图像，此函数可将输出图像中 (col, row) 坐标的 (M, 2) 数组转换为输入图像中其对应的坐标。可以通过 map_args 指定该函数的其他参数。

trans-unit.source: For 2-D images, you can directly pass a transformation object, e.g. skimage.transform.SimilarityTransform, or its inverse.
trans-unit.target: 对于二维图像，您可以直接传递一个转换对象，例如 skimage.transform.SimilarityTransform 或它的逆对象。

trans-unit.source: For 2-D images, you can directly pass a transformation object, e.g. skimage.transform.SimilarityTransform, or its inverse.
trans-unit.target: 对于二维图像，您可以直接传递一个变换对象，例如 skimage.transform.SimilarityTransform 或它的反函数。

trans-unit.source: For 2-D images, you can pass a (3, 3) homogeneous transformation matrix, e.g. skimage.transform.SimilarityTransform.params.
trans-unit.target: 对于2D图像，您可以传递 (3, 3) 均匀变换矩阵，例如 skimage.transform.SimilarityTransform.params 。

trans-unit.source: For 2D images when approximate=True, the running time of this method only depends on size of the image. It is independent of sigma as one would expect. The downside is that the result for sigma less than 3 is not accurate, i.e., not similar to the result obtained if someone computed the Hessian and took its determinant.
trans-unit.target: 对于 approximate=True 2D图像，此方法的运行时间仅取决于图像的大小。正如预期的那样，它独立于 sigma 。不足之处是 sigma 小于 3 的结果不准确，即与某人计算Hessian并采用其行列式获得的结果不相似。

trans-unit.source: For pad_input=True matches correspond to the center and otherwise to the top-left corner of the template. To find the best match you must search for peaks in the response (output) image.
trans-unit.target: 对于 pad_input=True ,匹配项对应于模板的中心，否则对应于模板的左上角。为了找到最佳匹配，您必须在响应（输出）图像中搜索峰值。

trans-unit.source: For uint8 (and uint16 up to a certain bit-depth) data, the lower algorithm complexity makes the skimage.filters.rank.maximum function more efficient for larger images and structuring elements.
trans-unit.target: 对于 uint8 （以及 uint16 直至特定位深度）的数据，较低的算法复杂度使 skimage.filters.rank.maximum 函数对于较大的图像和结构元素更有效。

trans-unit.source: For uint8 (and uint16 up to a certain bit-depth) data, the lower algorithm complexity makes the skimage.filters.rank.minimum function more efficient for larger images and structuring elements.
trans-unit.target: 对于 uint8 （以及 uint16 直至特定位深度）的数据，较低的算法复杂度使 skimage.filters.rank.minimum 函数对于较大的图像和结构元素更有效。

trans-unit.source: For uint8 (and uint16 up to a certain bit-depth) data, the lower algorithm complexity makes the skimage.filters.rank.maximum function more efficient for larger images and structuring elements.
trans-unit.target: 对于 uint8 （以及 uint16 直至特定位深度）的数据，较低的算法复杂度使 skimage.filters.rank.maximum 函数对于较大的图像和结构元素更有效。

trans-unit.source: For uint8 (and uint16 up to a certain bit-depth) data, the lower algorithm complexity makes the skimage.filters.rank.minimum function more efficient for larger images and structuring elements.
trans-unit.target: 对于 uint8 （以及 uint16 直至特定位深度）的数据，较低的算法复杂度使 skimage.filters.rank.minimum 函数对于较大的图像和结构元素更有效。

trans-unit.source: For N-D images you can pass a coordinate array, that specifies the coordinates in the input image for every element in the output image. E.g. if you want to rescale a 3-D cube, you can do:
trans-unit.target: 对于N-D图像,你可以传递一个坐标数组,指定输入图像中每个元素在输出图像中的坐标。例如,如果你想重新缩放一个三维立方体,你可以这样做。

trans-unit.source: For N-D images, you can directly pass an array of coordinates. The first dimension specifies the coordinates in the input image, while the subsequent dimensions determine the position in the output image. E.g. in case of 2-D images, you need to pass an array of shape (2, rows, cols), where rows and cols determine the shape of the output image, and the first dimension contains the (row, col) coordinate in the input image. See scipy.ndimage.map_coordinates for further documentation.
trans-unit.target: 对于ND图像，您可以直接传递坐标数组。第一个尺寸指定输入图像中的坐标，而后续的尺寸确定输出图像中的位置。例如，对于二维图像，您需要传递一个形状为 (2, rows, cols) 的数组，其中， rows 和 cols 确定输出图像的形状，第一个维度包含 (row, col) 坐标输入图像。有关更多文档，请参见 scipy.ndimage.map_coordinates 。
